children.textContent:
Text Formatting Examples
    
    This paragraph contains various inline formatting: bold text, italic text, and inline code.
    
    Links can be formatted too: bold link, italic link, and regular link.
    
    More advanced formatting includes strikethrough text and highlighted text.
    
    Complex combinations: bold italic, bold code link, and italic code.
    
    Reference links: See the documentation for more details, or check the API reference.
    
    
    
    {
        "test_id": "text_002_formatting_links",
        "category": "text",
        "features": ["links", "text-decoration", "bold", "italic", "inline-code", "strikethrough", "text-combinations"],
        "description": "Text formatting with links, emphasis, code, and various combinations of inline styles",
        "markdown_equivalent": "### Text Formatting Examples\n\nThis paragraph contains various inline formatting: **bold text**, *italic text*, and `inline code`.\n\nLinks can be formatted too: [**bold link**](#), [*italic link*](#), and [regular link](#).\n\nMore advanced formatting includes ~~strikethrough text~~ and highlighted text.\n\nComplex combinations: ***bold italic***, [**`bold code link`**](#), and *`italic code`*.",
        "complexity": "intermediate"
    }
This paragraph contains various inline formatting: bold text, italic text, and inline code.

metadata.description: Text formatting with links, emphasis, code, and various combinations of inline styles
metadata.markdown_equivalent:
### Text Formatting Examples

This paragraph contains various inline formatting: **bold text**, *italic text*, and `inline code`.

Links can be formatted too: [**bold link**](#), [*italic link*](#), and [regular link](#).

More advanced formatting includes ~~strikethrough text~~ and highlighted text.

Complex combinations: ***bold italic***, [**`bold code link`**](#), and *`italic code`*.
